product_name: Lowepro Flipside Sport 20L AW Camera Pack
long_description: Sleek yet cavernous, the Lowepro Flipside Sport 20L AW camera pack provides a tough and technical carrying option geared toward outdoor and action sports photographers. Back-entry camera compartment offers quick access to gear, added security while wearing, and allows you to go from carrying to shooting without putting the bag on the ground. Adjustable camera compartment provides space for gear and can accommodate a pro-sized 300mm lens; compartment may be removed to convert to a fully functional daypack. Breathable padding with air channels wicks moisture at the back and shoulders; multiple adjustment points create a comfortable fit at the shoulders, sternum and waist. Hydration-ready pocket accommodates a 1-liter hydration reservoir (sold separately). Padded, zippered pocket protects your iPad or similarly sized tablet. Tripod attachment system provides secure attachment of a tripod or monopod for jostle-free carrying; zippered pocket offers storage for small accessories and personal items. Resilient, 210-denier triple-ripstop nylon and polyurethane coating provide light weight and durability. The Lowepro Flipside Sport 20L AW camera pack includes a patented, all-weather cover that helps protect gear from rain, snow, dust and sand.
short_description: Sleek yet cavernous, the Lowepro Flipside Sport 20L AW camera pack provides a tough and technical carrying option geared toward outdoor and action sports photographers.
